quotes.text: If you can think, speak and write, you are unstoppable.
quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

quotes.text: The pen is mightier than the sword.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.text: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Express yourself like the common people, but think wisely.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The most valuable talent is never using two words when one will do.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: If you don't have time to read, you don't have time to write.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: I write to discover what I know.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.text: Words are the most powerful drug used by mankind.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.text: The right word is the difference between the lightning bug and lightning.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: One day I will find the right words, and they will be simple.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.text: Stay drunk on writing so reality cannot destroy you.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Words can be like X-rays if you use them properly.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: To write well is to think clearly. That's why it's so hard.
quotes.author: David McCullough

quotes.text: The first draft is just you telling yourself the story.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: A word after a word after a word is power.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.text: The scariest moment is always just before you start.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: You can make anything by writing.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: A professional writer is an amateur who didn't quit.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: The water does not flow until the faucet is turned on.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.text: Write hard and clear about what hurts.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: If there's a book you want to read, you must write it.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.text: Writing is its own reward.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.text: The purpose of a writer is to keep civilization from destroying itself.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: A writer finds writing more difficult than other people.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.text: The road to hell is paved with adverbs.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: Good writing is clear thinking made visible.
quotes.author: Bill Wheeler

quotes.text: The best time to plan a book is while you're doing dishes.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.text: Write what disturbs you, what you fear, what you haven't spoken about.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.text: Writing is a way of talking without being interrupted.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.text: The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.text: If you want to change the world, pick up your pen and write.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: Make resolutions, minute-by-minute, even second-by-second if needed.
quotes.author: Amir Bibi

quotes.text: Writers live twice.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.text: To produce a mighty book, choose a mighty theme.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.text: Writing is the painting of the voice.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: A word is dead when it is said, some say. I say it just begins to live that day.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.text: Fill your paper with the breathings of your heart.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.text: Writing is an exploration. You start from nothing and learn as you go.
quotes.author: E.L. Doctorow

quotes.text: The role of a writer is to say what we are unable to say.
quotes.author: Ana√Øs Nin
